name: The Wuzzle
description:
Beta 1.1 Test Phase
This game features jumpscares not recommended for people with heart conditions, SkullNation Games is not responsible for any harm caused by the game.

The Wuzzle is a 1st person horror game where you try to stay alive as long as possible to gain a higher score. But maybe theres something deeper about the game. 

This is my first official game and its still in testing! If you encounter any bugs or issues Please let us know on our discord https://discord.gg/Wuxs4P4 If you have any suggestions for us or the game we will listen.

Dont die,
   Sincerely,   SkullNation Games.
